topic.title: switch hub
topic.body: My registration at zerome is to choose the hub space will be full.  I want to switch to a hub with a larger limit.  I need help.

1580222021_1Ko7622HKggRGbJny5hCS4n9wwMAV.body: I want to switch the HUB while preserving the original data.  How do I do it. I don't know :(

> [asukitah](#comment_1_1P8yajz8nQm8Gc1A1R9uKXkqyKDx5jEG8t): to swiwitch to another hub porting your data use this site http://127.0.0.1:43110/1QHbf72f4vdx3QAxN1LTN9KP19J428Q85R/

Thank you! I changed my hub!
